long_description:
# Double Tap: MineClonia

- It adds double tap sprinting to MineClonia
- Change the sprint speed
- Advanced step interval settings
- Hunger drain will also apply
name: double_tap_mc
short_description: Adds double tap sprinting with hunger drain for MineClonia
title: Double Tap: MineClonia
